entry.title: Sunday: Periods of light snow. High minus 9.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of light snow beginning near noon. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 9. Wind chill minus 25 this morning and minus 17 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Sunday 26 February 2023
